author: sky.cactus
content: The editors may allow direct to review.  I would just do the path you said though, just to avoid any conflict.

author: wjmelements
content: I went stagnant -> review earlier this year https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4925 so I think it will be fine, unless it is a new policy
